profileModals.supportDescription: Need help? Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
profileModals.faqQuestion1: How do I reset my password?
profileModals.faqAnswer1: Go to the login screen and tap 'Forgot Password', then follow the instructions sent to your email.
profileModals.faqQuestion2: How do I update the app?
profileModals.faqAnswer2: Visit the App Store or Google Play Store and check for updates in the 'Updates' section.
profileModals.appDescription: This is a multi-purpose application designed to help users manage their daily tasks efficiently and effectively.
